messages.title: Theresa May: Strong, Stable Leadership in the National Interest
messages.content: A coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn. Discussions between Labour, Liberal Democrats and the SNP on how to prop up a weak, floundering and nonsensical 'progressive alliance.' Think Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister is never going to happen? Don't be so sure.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Backing the Prime Minister’s plan to get the best possible Brexit deal.
Creating more jobs and supporting local businesses.
Investing in our local schools and supporting our NHS, building a stronger economy.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
issues.economy: Economic Stability and Jobs - Creating more jobs and supporting local businesses.

community.content: Investing in our local schools and supporting our NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: A Local Champion for Newcastle: Owen Meredith has the record we need to champion our area in Westminster.

politicalExperience.role: Previous roles in supporting the Prime Minister’s plan.
